verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Blessed <S%H835><s%> is every one that feareth <S%H3373><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, That walketh <S%H1980><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>.
For thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> the labor <S%H3018><s%> of thy hands <S%H3709><s%>: Happy <S%H835><s%> shalt thou be <S%H2896><s%>, and it shall be well with thee.

Thy wife <S%H802><s%> shall be as a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%>, In the innermost parts <S%H3411><s%> of thy house <S%H1004><s%>; Thy children <S%H1121><s%> like olive <S%H2132><s%> plants <S%H8363><s%>, Round about <S%H5439><s%> thy table <S%H7979><s%>.
Behold <S%H1397><s%>, thus shall the man be blessed <S%H1288><s%> That feareth <S%H3373><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> thee out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: And see <S%H7200><s%> thou the good <S%H2898><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%>.
Yea <S%H7200><s%>, see thou thy children <S%H1121><s%>'s children <S%H1121><s%>. Peace <S%H7965><s%> be upon Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
